name: Mordle
description:
Basically you got Wordle, but you don't have to wait entire day for a new word.

Originally made as a problem-solving, algorithmic practice of automatic solving, turned into full-blown app due to one definitely not annoying specific person. 

Shout out to original Wordle: https://www.powerlanguage.co.uk/wordle/

=== This is still in development, for now Android only. ===

Words are drawn randomly from wordlist that original Wordle draws (~2351 words), but also supports the other "acceptable" words (~10657) (these are not drawn but accepted as answers).

=== Known issues:

  • issues with hint algorithm; words with double letters tend to mess it up
  • issues with coloring double letters (correct word contains one "I" but colors both "I"s in "VIVID")
  • no feedback; no info shown in cases like
    • word not in wordlist
    • level complete (you just see all letters green)
  • no (yet) keyboard coloring like in Wordle
  • keyboard colors are slightly off, more choco cookies work required

=== Planned features:

  • Sounds (Wins, Loses, Resets)
  • Animations (Wins, Loses, Resets)
  • Local Scoreboards
  • Different scoreboards for no hints rounds, hints rounds and scored hint rounds
  • Debug mode for feedback report
  • Approval of Play Protect, maybe even put it on Play Store
  • Cut down on file size (probably unity 2D packages that are not used)

=== User feedback ideas:

  • Skins (idea of Sappery)
